job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: strongHiring in Canada and the US onlybrbrstrongAt Urbint our mission is to make communities more resilient We do this by pairing external data with artificial intelligence to identify areas of high risk and prevent catastrophic loss for utilities and infrastructure operators across the country We are a team of closeknit engineers entrepreneurs and data geeks who obsess over problemsolving new technologies and making a positive impact in our communitiesbrbrWe encourage people from underrepresented groups to applybrbrstrong Job Summary brbrstrongAt Urbint the Machine Learning team does not work on making consumers spend more or on maximizing clicks That is all fine we work on reducing carbon emissions reducing infrastructure risk and avoiding fatalities We find meaning and excitement solving these problems and we hope you do toobrbrWe are looking for a Data Scientist level 1 or level 2 to join our high visibility high impact Machine Learning team to help with this mission The ML team collaborates with a diverse broadermission team to deliver value for our customers Members of the Machine Learning team have the option to majorminor in areas from a large data science specialization spectrum Technical Product Management People Management Data StoryTelling Applied ML ML Research AutoML AlgoPerformance and MLOps DE SRE This is a great role for someone who enjoys variety and is also looking to expand their skill set in a structured fashionbrbrstrong What Youll Do brstrongul liYou will translate business problems into data science problems and develop solution frameworks for repeatabilityscaling with focus on speed to valueli liYou will be building machine learning models for a variety of use casesli liYou will have good communication and problem solving skillsliulul liYou will convey complex ideas amp tradeoff decisions to business stakeholders li ul liOverall you will be responsible for building ML products that deliver measurable business value for customersli brbrstrong Who You Are brstrongul liWellversed in Python or R an d willing to continue to learn the Python ecosystemli liVery comfortable with basic Predictive modeling Classification NLP Content Recommendation systems and Time Series techniquesliulul liBeing very comfortable with the math behind these techniques is keyli ul liNot required to know all toolstechniques out there but a passion for learning being up to date and the ability to quickly map the problem to a solution space are musthavesli brstrongNice to Havebrstrongul liComfortable with startup or Agile environmentsli liComfortable with Gitli liTrack record of creating excellent slack emojis and memesli brbrulstrong Benefits brstrongul liMissiondriven  some companies use AI to serve better digital ads and trade stocks we seek to make our communities safer and more resilientli li100 Distributed  work from anywhere li liDistributed work monthly stipendli liCompetitive compensation packageli liBest in class medical coverage  100 benefits and premiums paidli liHealth perks  wellness reimbursementli liEducational allowance  up to 1000 yr li liWeekly lunch stipendli brbrulWere an equal opportunity employer All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin veteran or disability status
